title: Our League Keeps Crashing?
body: Ive been playing with my friends all day and it keeps crashing for everyone at random times. We were in ranked teams and we just got a free lose because of it and it keeps happening to all of us. Please fix it ):

replies.body: Bump. This has happened to me and 3 other friends during champ select. It counts as a queue dodge + loss if ranked.

If this is still happening can you give me a more detailed description of how it is crashing? Crashes can be caused by a number of things, which error messages or a description of the behavior can help us pinpoint the cause.
sorry for late response. It stopped now but it was so weird it just kept crashing non stop for all of us that one day,
